name: The Normal Day
description: At a glance, The Normal Day may look like your run-of-the-mill 2D RPG game. The reality, however, could not be any further from the truth. The Normal Day is actually an expansive game that encourages you to explore as you defeat your opponents and become the hero of your own universe. Filled with fun, excitement and emotions, all set around a relatable main character who lives in a world not too dissimilar from our own.
